text: Yadi subha kichu tomadera jan'ya ghate tabe seta tadera duhkha deya, ara yadi manda kichu tomadera pakara'o tabe tate tara haya paramanandita. Ara yadi tomara dhairyasila o dharmaparayana ha'o tabe tadera sarayantra tomadera etatuku ksati karabe na. Nihsandeha tara ya karache ta allah ghire rayechena.
